question: What is the SATAT scheme?
option1: Scheme to set up bio gas plant
option2: Scheme to incentivise bio gas sale
option3: Scheme to incentivise bio gas production
answer: Scheme to set up bio gas plant
explanation: Sustainable Alternative Towards Affordable Transportation (SATAT) is an initiative to set up Compressed Bio-Gas (CBG) production plants and make available CBG in the market for use in automotive fuels.
